contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 5 工作经历 Work Experiences
面试官史密斯先生在向求职者杰克询问其工作经历。

contents.title: 史密斯：很高兴见到你。
contents.answer: Smith: Nice to meet you.

contents.title: 杰克：我也很高兴见到您。
contents.answer: Nice to meet you, too.

contents.title: 史密斯：你是个毕业生，是吗？
contents.answer: Smith: You are a graduate, right?

contents.title: 杰克：我最近才大学毕业，主修的是英语专业。
contents.answer: I recently graduated from college as an English major.

contents.content: 当你在回答有关工作经验的问题时，不要简单地将自己的经验和成功之处阐述一遍。最好是与所应聘的工作联系起来具体说明你的经验和成就，这样会使你成为最佳人选。要注意实事求是，不要一味夸夸其谈，否则招人反感。此外，要避免时间的缺漏，可以用兼职来填补空白。

contents.title: 史密斯：这样说来，是没有相关的工作经验了。
contents.answer: Smith: So you don't have much related work experience.

contents.title: 杰克：的确如此。不过，我仍然要请您给我一次机会，我会努力学习的。
contents.answer: Admittedly, I don't. But I still beg you to give me an opportunity, and I'm willing to learn with my best effort.

contents.title: 史密斯：那么，在大学里你获得过什么荣誉或是奖励吗？
contents.answer: Smith: Well, did you get any honors or rewards in college?

contents.title: 杰克：我取得了商务英语证书和英语专业八级证书。
contents.answer: I have got a Business English Certifi cate and a Certifi cate of TEM 8.

contents.title: 史密斯：计算机技能如何？
contents.answer: Smith: What about your computer skills?

contents.title: 杰克：我曾接受过专业培训，我相信自己可以胜任这份工作。
contents.answer: I got professional training in this fi eld, and I believe I can fit the position well.

contents.content: 初涉职场的毕业生，自然没有太多的工作经验。不过，可以尽量展示自己最好的一面给面试官，比如展示自己的学识、能力、乐观、协作、勤奋、谨慎、踏实等，使对方信服，并且表示自己愿意努力学习，所有的这一切应当足以弥补你经验的不足。

contents.title: 史密斯：别的方面呢？
contents.answer: Smith: And anything else?

contents.title: 杰克：在大学里，我曾学过有关翻译、商务英语的课程等。我的英语口语和写作能力都不错。
contents.answer: I have taken some courses in college, such as translation, business English, and so on. So I have a good mastery of both spoken and written English.

contents.title: 史密斯：我知道了。
contents.answer: Smith: I see.

contents.title: 杰克：您的肯定是我的荣幸。
contents.answer: Your approval would be my honor.

contents.content: 此外，也可以说你曾参加过的社会实践，比如：兼职、实习、协作性活动、公益团体活动或者是学校组织的实践活动。

contents.title: 1.你从上一份工作中学到了什么？
contents.answer: What have you learned from your last job?

contents.title: 2.虽然我没有相关的工作经验，但是我会尽最大努力去学习的。
contents.answer: Though I have no related experience, I am willing to learn to my best effort.

contents.title: 3.去年他一毕业就在这家公司工作。
contents.answer: He has worked in the company since he graduated last year.

contents.title: 4.很抱歉，我没有销售经验。
contents.answer: I am sorry to say that I have no experience in sales.

contents.title: 5.你在那所高中任教多久了？
contents.answer: How long have you taught in the high school?

contents.title: 6.你接受过办公技能的专业培训了吗？
contents.answer: Have you got any special training in office skills?

contents.title: 7.她在这家公司负责电脑编程。
contents.answer: She has been responsible for computer programing in the company.

contents.title: 8.作为英语专业的学生，她已获得了商务英语证书。
contents.answer: She has received a Business English Certifi cate as an English major.

contents.title: 9.她可以合理地安排时间，所以总是能够按时完成任务。
contents.answer: She can manage her time well, so that she can always fi nish her tasks on time.

contents.title: 10.因为具备操作现代办公设备的经验，他认为自己可以胜任这份工作。
contents.answer: He thinks he can fit the position as he is experienced in operating modern office equipment.
